upgrade.tapparitions.er_i.description: If player was to reach a near-death situation, the TARDIS will grant it strong Regeneration
upgrade.tapparitions.healing_i.descripti: Basic Healing capabilities for everyone in the TARDIS
upgrade.tapparitions.healing_iii.descrip: Greatly enhances the basic healing capabilities of a TARDIS
upgrade.tapparitions.healing_iv.descript: Gives everyone in the TARDIS some beneficial effects
upgrade.tapparitions.protection_i.descri: Makes sure players wont get lethal damage
upgrade.tapparitions.protection_ii.descr: Protects anyone inside the TARDIS, doesn't let their health go below 25%
upgrade.tapparitions.protection_iii.desc: Protects anyone inside the TARDIS, doesn't let their health go below 50%
upgrade.tapparitions.protection_iv.descr: Protects anyone inside the TARDIS, doesn't let their health drop.
upgrade.tapparitions.protection_v.descri: Protects anyone in 16 range from the exterior from all incoming damage
upgrade.tapparitions.recovery_ii.descrip: Allows the TARDIS to remove any negative effect
